11111.content: One day Matt and Tai were walking together to try and find a new Digimon Tai talked about. When walking, Tai discovered that his stoumach was gurgling. "Hmm..... I have to fart real bad...." he say and looked at Matt. "Hey Matt look over there!" he said and pointed to somewhere. Matt turned, and Tai jumped on top of him and let out a long FFPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBTTTTTT! "Tai, what's that smell?" Matt asked, but his question went unanswered for he smelled the smell, gagged and blacked out. What does Tai do now?

A groan from his stomach indicated that he was not done yet and with a layer of cloth removed he squatted over his sandy haired rivals face his butt cheeks hovering above his nose.

1132.content:
Tai woke up and found that he had a new message from Sora.
He said:
"Biyomon is stupid. It's your fault. Agumon is way better thanks to me."
She responded:
"Wait till tomorrow, we'll see who's the weak one."
Tai thought it was a lie and that Sora would never actually come over. Then he heard an angry knock at the door. He shrieked. Sora wasn't joking.
What does Tai do?
1132.title: Tai

choices: "Make sure our slave here can't move"
11321.content:
"What's the worst that could happen. Sora's not gonna hurt me" Tai thinks.
He opens the door. Sora is pouting with her hands on her hips. She is wearing a bikini. In her hands she has some rope and handcuffs. Behind her is Biyomon.
"What where you saying last night about me being weak" Biyomon asks angrily.
"What are you gonna do?" Tai asks bravely.
"Biyomon. Get him" Sora orders.
Biyomon tackles Tai and pins him down on the couch.
"Here Sora. Tie him down." Tai struggles for freedom but Biyomon is stronger than she looks.
"Quit squirming stupid" She orders as she wraps the rope around him, strapping him to the couch and restraining his arms.
"Guess what Tai." Sora askd
"W-what?" Tai replies timidly.
"I got a secret"
"What i-is it?"
"I ate Broccoli and cheesecake this morning"
Tai suddenly realized his fate. Sora was gonna fart on him.
"Biyomon" Sora begins

Hi" Sora giggles "Did my farts REALLY knock you out?"

"Oh my God. He really looks terrified." She comments.
"I know right. It only took like a minute" They smile and laugh.
Sora suddenly stops laughing and looks at Tai angrily
"Tai. What did you say before you passed out?" she asks

"See Rika" Sora points out, "I need help teaching him his place"
Rika smiles, "I know how to deal with him."
"What do you mean" Sora asks.
"I had to teach Henry a lesson last summer. He wasn't obedient at first but after I farted enough and showed him my whip he learned his place."
Tai was terrified. "What happened to him?" he asks
Rika smiles, "Right now he's at my house. Waiting for his mistress to return so he can smell my farts."

"Of course not Mistress Sora" Tai answers

Tai doesn't bother arguing. if he says something he might get in more trouble and he can't defend himself at the moment.

"Now whichever one of us has to fart first gets to sit on Tai" Rika explains.

11322.content:
I gotta hide! Tai thought as he went upstairs. He saw his sister, Kari. "Aren't you going to answer the door?" she asked. "Uh, I'm kinda busy," Tai said as he ran up to his room. Kari went to answer the door instead. She saw an angry Sora. "Hello, Sora," Kari said. "Kari, where's Tai?" Sora asked angrily. "Uh, he's in his room," Kari answered as she heard Sora's stomach rumble. "Are you okay, Sora?" Kari asked innocently. "Yeah, just need to clear something with your brother," Sora said as she hurried upstairs. She barged into Tai's room to see him sitting on his bed, looking worried. "H-hello, Sora," Tai managed to say weakly. "What did you say about me and Biyomon?" she asked angrily. "Uh, I, um," Tai was trying to say somthing when Sora pushed him down and sat on his face. "Guess what?" Sora said, "I ate plenty of broccoli and cheesecakes this morning." Tai knew what was happening. These foods gave lots of gas, so that means that Sora was going to fart on him!
PRRBBTT!
Sora farted a loud and smelly one, enough to make Kari worry about what was going on. She went up to her brother's room, to see that Sora was sitting on her brother's face. "Sora, what are you doing?" Kari asked as Sora farted again. "Kari, your brother did some bad things and he needs to be punished. "I won't let you do that!" Kari said as she charged in to stop Sora. Does she succeed?

1252.content: Who is he going to fart on?
1252.title: Guilmon

12521.content:
For many years, you were with a very special Digimon and you two had the best of times ever since then. Guilmon, the red dinosuar you had ever since you were 6, was as playful as ever, you never seem to want to leave your home unless if he comes with you. At least, that was when you were 6...

18 years later, you became a full grown man and Guilmon never seemed to changed during that time. Today was different however, Guilmon hasn't been himself and it's been happening for 2 weeks now. You begin to wander what's up with him, your 24 years and you haven't changed you personality since you were 6. You still remember the day you got him, you found him alone digging through your own dumpster. When you lifted the lid, you found a scared Guilmon. You took him inside to properly feed him and that's how you two became besties.

Those were the days, but now Guilmon has been staring at you with dread and you have no clue what you did. You decided to talk to him.

"Guilmon... we need to talk. I've noticed you haven't been yourself lately for 2 weeks and I really want to know why. Did I do something to upset you in a way?"

The Digimon didn't even look at you
"Guilmon."

"Can you look at me at least?"

The digimon turned around to look at you, he wasn't as cheery at all

"Ok, you and I have been with each other for 18 years, if you feel insecure you can always tell me and I can fix that."

The digimon tilted it's head slightly, but kept his expression. You looked at the clock, it was midnight.

"Well.. I'll leave you alone then, but promise me were besties ok? I would never keep a secret as long as I live and neither should you."

Guilmon should nodded in agreement and gave a slight smile.

"There's my guy! I'm going to go to bed now, Night Guilmon."

"Guilmon."
The Digimon waved at you

You turned out the lights and went to bed, still thinking about Guilmon. You lay there, saying your head:

*Perhaps motivation is what Guilmon needs*

You slowly drift off to sleep, as Guilmon shuts the door and leaves you in peace. The next morning, you awoke from the sun peaking in from the blinds. Suddenly...
12521.title: You (Male)

125211.content:
You wake up the next morning feeling as fresh as you've ever been. Bird Digimons chirp and you feel like getting alot done today. You start to sit up, but you couldn't move.

"W-why can't I move? Did someone rob me last night? Was a sleep walking? Perhaps Guilmon can help me out here."

You don't know where your best friend was at the moment, so began to yell just in case he was on the other side of the house.

"GUILMON! I NEED SOME ASSISTANCE! I'M TIED UP, I CAN'T MOVE AT ALL, I KNOW YOUR PROBABLY STILL IN A BAD MOOD, BUT AT LEAST HELP A BROTHA OUT WILL YA!?"

Nothing happened, you begin to wonder if he's outside. A thought struck you, what if he's not even here? Did he run away? Did he get Digimonapped? You begin to worry.

"Alright.. Don't panic.. He's probanly going for a jog, He and I used to do that together, a jog in peace might help him in a way. Now, how do I.. get.. ugh.. this.. mmf.. off?"

You tried to get yourself free as best you could, but it did wasmade you tired and the rope tighter. You looked around to see if you could find something break free. You see your pocket knife on the end of your night stand.

Your feet weren't tied together, but your not that tall. You tried to grab it with your bare feet, you managed to touuh it, but you can't seem to grab it. It eventually fell off the table and onto the floor.

"Are you freakin' kidding me right now.."

You had no choice but to wait, and hope that Guilmon will come home. After about 20 minutes of waiting, you hear a click from the front door. You look to see who it is, it was Guilmon! His whole body was covered in sweat, he was definitely out jogging. Now was your chance to get his attention.

"Guilmon! I'm so happy to see you! I don't know if we got robbed or what, but I'm tied up and I can't move."

"Guilmon?"

"Yeah, or did you tie me up?"

Guilmon gave you a look and...
125211.title: You found yourself tied up

info.brief_description: The people and Digimon get gassed.
info.description:
The people and digimon of the anime Digimon get gassed.

Rules:

1. Keep it 13+ please.
2. Peeing is allowed.
3. Please watch atleast one episode of Digimon before adding to this story.
4. The characters can fart anywhere.
5. Have fun!
